basedOnWeightedSubtaskAverage: Based on subtask weighted progress (by estimation)
autoProgressInfo: Progress is automatically calculated based on the completion of subtasks and checklist items.
subtaskProgressInfo: Updating this subtask's progress will contribute to the parent task's overall progress calculation.
contributesToParentProgress: This progress contributes to the parent task's overall progress
manualProgressNote: Manual progress allows you to set a custom value that will be used instead of automatic calculation.
warningManualOverride: Manual progress overrides the automatic calculation and won't update automatically when subtasks are completed.
subtaskProgressHidden: Subtask progress only visible when parent is in manual mode
manualProgressDisabledDescription: Manual progress is disabled for this project. You can enable it in the project settings.
parentTaskProgressDescription: This task has subtasks. Its progress is automatically calculated based on the progress of its subtasks.
weightedProgressEnabledDescription: Parent task progress is calculated based on the weights of subtasks. Higher weight subtasks will have more impact on the parent's progress.
taskWeightTooltip: Higher values give this task more influence on parent progress calculation
taskWeightDescription: Determine how much this subtask contributes to the parent task's progress. Higher values have more impact.
